description:
Bocce, rain or shine. The soft balls won't damage walls or furniture when you're stuck inside. They also float, making Soft Bocce a great choice for the lake or beach when the sun is shining.

  • Made of ripstop nylon, filled with polypropylene pellets
  • Includes 8 throwing balls and 1 target ball
  • Includes mesh pouch for carrying
  • Colours vary. Consider this a known unknown
name: Outside Inside Freestyle Soft Bocce
